titles.title: To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions classified to chapters 44, 45, 46, and 47 of title 50, United States Code.
To make technical amendments to update statutory references to provisions classified to chapters 44, 45, 46, and 47 of title 50, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This bill makes technical amendments to statutory references in specified chapters of title 50 (War and National Defense) of the U.S. Code.
